name: Planetary Golf
description:
What?

Play as an astronaut travelling through different moons playing golf in space! Hit the ball into each hole around the moons.

Controls
  • You only need the mouse to play, press the LEFT mouse button and aim where you want the ball to go and release it to throw the ball.
  • Esc to Pause
Team
  • Elvis Leite;
    • Design (Mechanics & Aesthetics)
    • Programming (Foundations &  Integrations)
    • UI
    • Crappy Art
  • Ivan Garcia Filho;
    • Visual effects composition
    • UX
